author: Jon Wise
summary: I'm Jon Wise, aka codepoet, and I'm the maintainer of the webOS App Museum II, and developer of a number of recent apps for webOS and LuneOS. All my apps are open source, including any back-end services that support them. Check out my GitHub link below, or hit me up on the Discord server!
sponsorMessage: Like my apps? Why not buy me a coffee?
